introduction: The CINETECA NACIONAL DE CHILE will organise an extensive program within the framework of the Day of the audiovisual heritage. The main event will be the screening of the restored film "El Cuerpo y la Sangre", by Rafael Sanchez (1962), on the evening of 27th October 2006.Rafael Sanchez has been an important figure of the CINETECA NACIONAL. He has been active as film maker, teacher and founder of the Film Institute of the Catholic University of Santiago, in 1955. As a documentarist, he has made more than 30 documentaries between the 50's and the 80's.
